channel.title: Programming on Sastibe's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Sastibe's Data Science Blog

item.title: My Motivations for Starting a Blog
item.description: Hello world! I am a Data Scientist. This field is notoriously difficult to describe, but I like this definition. My job requires me to spend a lot of time each day writing code in varying languages, mostly R but also Python and SAS. This inevitably leads me to spend a lot of time thinking about both code as well as the process of programming itself. Recently, I stumbled upon1 a incredibly concise diagram:
